thread.title: Jennifer Doumenis
thread.title_full: Extra Space Storage reviewed by Jennifer Doumenis

author: Jennifer Doumenis
title: Jennifer Doumenis
text: From day one I have had the best experience with the company, from helpful and knowledgeable staff and totally reasonable and affordable rates to the ultimate in cleanliness and security. I would absolutely recommend Extra Space Storage to anyone who would be in need of a facility to store their belongings.
